original_title: Pico Reja: la verdad que la tierra esconde
overview: A historical and archaeological investigation of the mass grave of Pico Reja, located in the cemetery of Seville, where the remains of about two thousand people, victims of the brutal repression exercised by the rebel side during the Spanish Civil War (1936-39), are buried.
title: Pico Reja: The Truth Buried Beneath
